channel.title: CVE Feed for Digital Arts Inc. -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Digital Arts Inc. -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-10859|2024-08-05T17:50:12.573Z -- digital%20arts%20inc. -- %22i-filter%206.0%20installer%22
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in "i-filter 6.0 installer" timestamp of code signing is before 23 Aug 2017 (JST) allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2017-10858|2024-08-05T17:50:12.647Z -- digital%20arts%20inc. -- %22i-filter%206.0%20install%20program%22
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in "i-filter 6.0 install program" file version 1.0.8.1 and earlier allows an attacker to gain privileges via a Trojan horse DLL in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2018-16180|2024-08-05T10:17:37.625Z -- digital%20arts%20inc. -- i-filter
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in i-FILTER Ver.9.50R05 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-10860|2024-08-05T17:50:12.548Z -- digital%20arts%20inc. -- %22i-filter%206.0%20installer%22
item.description: Untrusted search path vulnerability in "i-filter 6.0 installer" timestamp of code signing is before 23 Aug 2017 (JST) allows an attacker to execute arbitrary code via a specially crafted executable file in an unspecified directory.

item.title: CVE-2018-16181|2024-08-05T10:17:38.189Z -- digital%20arts%20inc. -- i-filter
item.description: HTTP header injection vulnerability in i-FILTER Ver.9.50R05 and earlier may allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTP headers and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks that may result in an arbitrary script injection or setting an arbitrary cookie values via unspecified vectors.
